contentrichtext.text: {{wiktionary}} '''Tang''' or '''TANG''' may refer to: * [[Tang (drink)]], a brand name of instant fruit flavored drinks from the 1950s to the present * [[Tang (weaponry)]], a projecting element connecting a knife or sword blade to the handle * [[Tang (clevis)]], part of a clevis fastener or joint It may also refer to: <div style="float:right;"> __TOC__ </div> ==Chinese dynasties and states== * [[Tang Dynasty]] (618–907), Chinese dynasty ** Tang People (唐人): used in southern China to refer to the [[Han Chinese]] * [[Later Tang Dynasty]] (923–936), Turkic dynasty in ancient China * [[Southern Tang]] (937–975), one of the [[Ten Kingdoms]] in south-central China <!--* [[Shang Dynasty]]: state conquered by Zhou Dynasty --> * [[Jin (Chinese state)]]: Zhou Dynasty state established in the old Tang territory, originally also called Tang * [[Tang (Spring and Autumn)]]: minor state conquered by Chu ==Surname and Peoples== *[[Tang of Shang]] (湯), of [[Shang dynasty]] ruler *[[Tang (Chinese surname)]] (湯/汤, Pinyin: Tāng), [[Shang]] in old Chinese Common **[[Tang Wei]] (湯唯), Chinese Actress *[[Táng (surname)]] (唐, Pinyin: Táng), [[Chinese language|Chinese]] surname, [[Dang (surname)|Dang]], [[Duong]] in the Common *[[Deng (surname)|Tang]] (surname), [[Hong Kong]] Chinese Common of [[Deng (surname)]] (鄧/邓, Pinyin: Dèng) **[[Tang Clan]] (鄧族) of Hong Kong, the first inhabitants to settle in Hong Kong *[[Teng (surname)|Tang]] (surname), [[Cantonese]] of [[Teng (surname)]] (滕, Pinyin: Téng) ==Fish and related US warships== * [[Acanthuridae]], a family of marine fish known as tangs * US submarines called for the fish, including ** [[USS Tang (SS-306)|USS ''Tang'' (SS-306)]], a United States Navy Balao class submarine that served briefly in World War II before being sunk by one of its own torpedoes ** A [[Tang class submarine|''Tang'' class submarine]] of the United States Navy ** [[USS Tang (SS-563)|USS ''Tang'' (SS-563)]] the lead ship of that class ==Places== * [[Tang, Badakhshan]], village in Afghanistan * [[Tang, Bhutan]], a village in [[Bumthang District]], Bhutan * [[Tang County]] (唐县), Baoding, Hebei, China * [[Tang, Shanghai]] (唐镇), town in [[Pudong]], Shanghai, China * [[Tang, County Westmeath]], village in Ireland * [[Tang, North Yorkshire]], settlement in England * [[Tang, South Khorasan]], a village in South Khorasan Province, Iran * [[Tang Gonda]], a village in Khuzestan Province, Iran * [[Tang Julan]], a village in Khuzestan Province, Iran * [[Tang-e Rashid]], a village in Khuzestan Province, Iran * [[Tang-e Zirgol Bardar]], a village in Khuzestan Province, Iran ==Acronyms== * [[Tennessee Air National Guard]] * [[Texas Air National Guard]] * [[Texas Army National Guard]] ==Other== * [[Guk]], soup or stew in Korean cuisine, sometimes known as "tang" {{disambig|geo}}
